refnamediv.refpurpose: Releases the FT_Face from a FreeType backend font

listitem.simpara: A cairo_font_t from the FreeType font backend. Such an object can be created with cairo_ft_font_create or cairo_ft_font_create_for_ft_face. On some platforms the font from cairo_current_font will also be a FreeType font, but using this functionality with fonts you don't create yourself is not recommended.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
functions cairo_ft_font_unlock_face
Releases a face obtained with cairo_ft_font_lock_face. See the documentation for that function for full details.
